pages.text: Faucet can be activated by right clicking it's handle.$(br2)If it's powered with redstone it's active and non active states are inverted.$(br2)They extract items from the inventory bellow and spill them right bellow it's nozzle with a one second interval.

You can connect Faucet in a fluid containing block.$(br2)Fluid containing blocks include: Waterlogged blocks, Fluid tanks, Jars, Goblets, Cauldrons, and special blocks like Pancakes, Tipped Spikes, Beehives are incluided too. $(br2)Once it's connected to a fluid containing block behind it can pour those fluids in any possible fluid container block below it. This will only be possible in 250mb increment.
Faucets can dump fluids in sponges effectively voiding them.$(br2)The same can already be done with lava cauldrons making them ideal trash can solutions.
